chatimportinstructions: Paste your chat messages below. The system will try to extract task details. Use keywords like 'Title:', 'Description:', 'Assignee:', 'Due Date:', 'Location:', 'Equipment Number:', 'Notification Num:', 'Priority:', 'Type of Work:', 'Status:' for best results. Each new 'Title:' will start a new task.
